website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas FWD-01 earphones deliver solid audio performance, but there are better-fitting, more waterproof models in this price range.
pros: Eartips allow you to hear your surroundings
Action button for Spotify/voice assistant shortcuts

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay on your head
customer_reviews.text: All right so for these headphones that are on-ear. PROS: They don't push too hard on your head which is really important for me as I wear glasses. also they are very durable, they are inside my gym bag for more than a month without a protective case and didn't even break You can wash everything on the headphones CONS: worst part of these great headphones is that they won't stay on my head. If I'm doing a deadlift the headphones will literally slide off my head. If you have hair buy these headphones if you don't just go for the under armour ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hocuspocus

customer_reviews.title: Worth is on sale, really sturdy lots of battery
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound quality , definitely not as good as my Marshall Mids but it's pretty good , unfortunately it makes me feel paranoid about sound leakage a lot so I don't turn them up to high . Update , super sturdy headphones great battery life, not a lot of sound leakage only if you're not wearing them but if at max volume people will hear it, well worth the money if you go to the gym or work and want something that sounds good , is comfy and doesn't get hot with great battery life
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: absolutely great headphones, but a bit too stressing to the head
customer_reviews.text: They look good, have very solid and premium feel, the functions are absolutely awesome (multiple pairings!), battery life is wonderful... everything is almost perfect... except one issue - they are TOO TIGHT! I bought it for running/exercise so it is actually good but still... it's too much! Couldn't there be some knob for adjusting this or something? :) Anyway, still a very good product!
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gym Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones. I have been using them for a week now and they are amazing! They are easy to connect to your phone and they remain on my head during push-ups and other horizontal movements. I highly recommend them for anyone looking for a great pair of gym headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bendix

customer_reviews.title: Not sweatproof. Lasted six months.
customer_reviews.text: Have tested many sports headphones. These are not wildly comfortable but great battery life, very robust, and perfectly decent sound for excercising. They err nicely on the bass side. But I left them on after a session yesterday and I guess the sweat got to them. Six months is really not a good return for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gym
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week, great use in the gym. signal a little weak once 10+ meters away from phone (which isn't often). Sound quality is great, good base.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Weston-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Used briefly but mainly good reviews from the person I gave them to.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Wow, excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect but I am very impressed with these. They were easy to set up and once on I was amazed with the quality. They sound great and clear, no distortion or dropout. They are okay with movement and they are very comfortable to wear. They clip together around the neck when not using and they are lightweight and you forget you are wearing them, except of course for the music in your ears! Really like these and they come in a great box for gifting. Sturdy too but not bulky. Good quality at a good price for what you are getting. Easy to charge and lasts for hours. Very pleased. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Twenty1stCenturyreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound, Booming bass
customer_reviews.text: Normally Bluetooth headphones can be hit or miss with loss of signal and poor sound quality. These sport headphones however have just the right balance of crisp sound with booming bass. The headphones are made with a comfortable knitted cord, And stay in place when I'm running. Thankfully these show no signs of Bluetooth signal disruption, And so far they last around 15-16 hours before needing another fast recharge via USB. They also come with extra earbuds in a small pouch bag if want to change the sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Merope Wellbeing

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cool innovations, but not my fave headphones
customer_reviews.text: I just don't like earbuds so I'm not the best person to judge these - maybe I have weird ear canals, but earbuds just don't stay in for me and these are no different. They're not entirely wireless, they are connected, which is probably better as they're not as easy to lose. And I like that they attach with a magnet when you're not using them, so they stay on like a necklace. Impressed that they're really quick to charge and a charge lasts for ages. Plus, when they STAY in my ears, the sound seems really good! If you like earbuds, you'll probably love these.
customer_reviews.author: seagull

customer_reviews.title: High quality Earphones
customer_reviews.text: These earphones arrive in a stylish presentation box. Complete with good quality and really clear instructions. The Bluetooth set up is quick- no problems here at all. When fitted the earphones fit completely as expected and are very comfortable. The sound reproduction is excellent as I would expect from this sort of costed product. There is a carry bag supplied as well. The earbuds included are of different sizes so need to check on the size. Overall excellent earphones. My concern is the cost. Are these really worth well over £100 ? Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones excel when it comes to comfort, waterproof materials, and battery life. But I feel that the sound is not quite as good as some of the other headphones in the price bracket. The Jabre brand headphones at a similar price offer the same features and better sound quality. That said, in terms of rugged materials and waterproofness, these are the best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: North of England Way

customer_reviews.title: High performance exercise eaphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these earphones is as you'd expect at this price level - pretty much flawless. other features score highly, too. The connecting cable is more comfortable in use than the usual rubber, the USB C charging is very fast, the bluetooth signal resilient to movement and the ear fit is just right for me. These are an excellent choice for performance exercise earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones for gym
customer_reviews.text: Can hurt the ears after wearing for a long time, however very good for the gym especially the toggle.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

product_meta.title: adidas Sport FWD-01 Bluetooth Earphone - Night Grey
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Night Grey| Style Name:FWD-01 Bluetooth EarphoneThe FWD-01 offers 16 hours of wireless playtime in a sweatproof design that’s optimised for your workout. Ergonomically designed earbuds use passive transparency so you can hear your surroundings and all the controls you need are on a lightweight, knitted, tangle-free chord, ensuring frictionless movement and warm-up, to workout, to recovery. Sport is constant. So are you.
feature_bullets: Up to 16 hours playtime with auto-pause, passive transparency and super-fast USB charging
Interchangeable ear tips and wings for a perfect fit
Knitted cord with easy to use controls and action button with optional custom shortcuts

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
